sp_widget.name: Remortgage Update
sp_widget.template:
Apply for a mortgage

You can appy over the phone, in branch or online.

Applying for a mortgage with MortgagesNow is simple. It involves two key stages: getting Decision in Principle (sometimes called an Agreement in Principle), and then making am ortgage application.

Getting your Decision in Principle

Applying for a Decision in Principle can be done over the phone, in branch or online.

  • A decision in Principle will give you an indication of the amount you may be able to borrow based on what you tell us and our security checks, including a soft credit check. A soft credit check will include an initial enquiry against your credit history and it will have no impact on your credit score. This won't be seen in searches by other companies.
  • When it comes to considering your application, we'll perform a full credit check, which may highlight anything in your credit history that would affect a mortgage application. A full credit check is a complete check against your credit history which is recorded on your credit file and is visible in searches by other companies.
  • A Decision in Principle is useful to have if you are house hunting, to show estate agents that you’re serious about buying a property. Please note a Decision in Principle is not an offer to lend to you and does not mean you are committing to apply for a Barclays mortgage.

Let's see if we can help

Has there been any changes to your remortgage application such as your personal details, property value, employment details, or financial information?

Hopefully we can make this easy for you!

What information do you need to update?

Oh no! It looks like you don't have an existing remortgage.

Please fill out each of the sections below to start a remortgage.

Employment Details

These are questions about your employer as well as your occupation details. Please fill them out to the best of your ability.

What is your Employer's name?

First and Last name are the only ones required!

Where is your Employer's address?

Use the office you report to, not headquarters

What is your Employment Type?

What is your Employer's status?

What is the name of your Occupation?

Please use your official title.

What is your office phone number?

+44

When did you start working for your employer?

Use your hire date, not your first day of work

/ /

Employment Income

Please fill out the information about the income received from your employer.

What is your income type?

Income Amount

How much is your total annual income?

£

Income Frequency

How often do you receive your paycheck?

Net Income

How much do you receive on average per paycheck?

£

Revaluation Details

Has any re-valuation of assets been carried out in the last 2 years?

Non-Recurring Item Details

Are there any non-recurring items in your profit and loss account?

Amount of non-recurring items

We've gone ahead and updated your remortgage!

Do you have any other information you'd like to update, or would you like to see your current remortgage now?

Affordability

We want to ask you a few quick questions about your ability to afford and pay this mortgage in the foreseeable future.

Future Affordability

Other Loans

Do you have any loans or other commitments not yet due, which will become payable during the. mortgage?

Out of the Ordinary Commitments

Based on your circumstances, do you have any other commitments that are out of the ordinary e.g. career related qualifications (Please do not include anything here that you have detailed in 'Other Committed Expenditure').

Property Related Expenses

Do you have any plans for Property Related Expenses which will affect your ability to pay this mortgage?

Personal Changes

Are there any personal changes that will affect your ability to pay this mortgage? e.g. change to job, changes to income or expenditure?

Savings

Total Amount of Savings

£

Estimate of your current property value. You can use a value estimate tool on a site like www.Zillow.com
